title: Martial Law Regulation No. 60 (Repeal) Act, 1989
description: Official consolidated text of Martial Law Regulation No. 60 (Repeal) Act, 1989 (VI of 1989) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement
provisions.content:
(1) This Act may be called the Martial Law Regulation
No. 60 (Repeal) Act, 1989.
(2) It shall come into force at once.

provisions.title: Section 2. Repeal of M.L.R. No. 60
provisions.content:
Martial Law Regulation No. 60, regarding Educational
Institutions in Islamabad Capital Territory, is hereby repealed.
